To,
{{employee.employee_name}}
 {{employee.designation}}
 {{employee.employee_number}}

Subject: Appraisal Letter


Dear {{employee.first_name}}


We congratulate you for your quality work, dedication and continuous effort in meeting the organization objectives.


{% set ns = namespace(monthly_salary= 0) %} {% if employee.custom_salary_structure_based_on == "Gross Based" %} {% set ns.monthly_salary = employee.custom_gross_salary %} {% else %} {% set ns.monthly_salary = employee.ctc %} {% endif %} On reviewing your performance for the year, we are pleased to inform you that, your salary has been accordingly appraised from Current monthly CTC of ₹ {{ns.monthly_salary}} P M ({{frappe.utils.money_in_words(ns.monthly_salary)}}) and Current annual CTC of ₹ {{ns.monthly_salary * 12}} P A ({{frappe.utils.money_in_words(ns.monthly_salary * 12)}}) to New Monthly CTC of ₹ {{"{{CustomAttributes.NewCTCPM}}"}} P M ({{"{{CustomAttributes.NewCTCPMwords}}"}}) and New annual CTC of ₹ {{"{{CustomAttributes.NewCTCPA}}"}} P A ({{"{{CustomAttributes.NewCTCPAwords}}"}}) with effect from {{"{{Custom Date}}"}}.


We hope you would render even more valuable contributions to the organization.


It is your responsibility to adhere to confidentiality of your salary and you are also advised not to share your revised salary details to anyone. Other terms and conditions remain the same as per company rules.


We wish you a bright and prosperous future with us.


Please acknowledge the acceptance of this letter.


Sincerely,

For, {{doc.company}} {% set ns = namespace(hr_manager = "") %} {% if doc.company %} {% set users = frappe.get_all("Employee", filters={"user_id": ["!=", ""], "company": doc.company, "status": "Active"}, fields=["user_id", "employee_name"]) %} {% for user in users %} {% set roles = frappe.get_all("Has Role",filters={"role":"HR Manager","parent":user.user_id}) %} {% if roles %} {% set ns.hr_manager = user.employee_name %} {% endif %} {% endfor %} {% endif %}

{{ns.hr_manager}}
